h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Boshan Censer Location
content: The Loong Scales are a rather well hidden item in Yellow Wind Ridge, requiring you to have the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss destroy a wall with its attack. You can also destroy it with the powerful Transformation Spells. Our guide below on how to get behind the waterfall will take you through the steps, alongside the links above to the individual places.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Boshan_Censer.md', within the main section titled 'Boshan Censer', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Boshan Censer Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Loong Scales are a rather well hidden item in Yellow Wind Ridge, requiring you to have the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss destroy a wall with its attack. You can also destroy it with the powerful Transformation Spells. Our guide below on how to get behind the waterfall will take you through the steps, alongside the links above to the individual places.
